Concept.Comments: This is the desktop version title
Concept.String: MyLabDesk^3 - This viewer is not intended for official interpretation

Concept.Comments: This is the desktop Light version title
Concept.String: MyLabDeskLight^3 - This viewer is not intended for official interpretation

Concept.Comments: This message appears if free disk space is getting low
Concept.String: Free disk space is getting low. It won't be possible to store further exams

Concept.Comments: This message appears if free disk space is under first threshold [Defect 10322]
Concept.String: Low Hard Disk space. Once Hard Disk icon will become red, no more images and clips will be stored.

Concept.Comments: This message appears if free disk space is under second threshold [Defect 10322]
Concept.String: No space left on the Hard Disk. Images and clips cannot be anymore stored.

Concept.Comments: This message appears if an error occurs during device startup
Concept.String: The initialization is not successful: the system will shutdown automatically. Please restart it

Concept.Comments: Minutes before shutdown if 6400 is unplugged from AC link
This message may apperar at boot-resuming if there's not enough battery charge
Concept.String: No conditions for starting. Battery level (%)

Concept.Comments: This message may apperar at boot-resuming if, on 64xx, the device is resumed without AC-Link
Concept.String: No conditions for starting. AC Status

Concept.Comments: Level of battery charge if 6400 is unplugged from AC link
Seconds before forced shutdown in case of alarm
This message may appear on 7400 for advising the user to close the ingoing operation due to low battery level
Concept.String: Low battery level. Plug the AC-Link for not losing current operations

Concept.Comments: This message appears on the device for advising the user that the shutdown will be performed
Concept.String: The shut down procedure will be automatically performed after

Concept.Comments: This message appears on the device for advising the user that any pending exam will be closed during the shutdown
Concept.String: Number of paused exams that will be automatically closed:

Concept.Comments: This message appears on the device for advising the user that the shutdown will be performed
Force the application to close
Force the application to perform shutdown
Force the application to hibernate
Force the operating system to hibernate. Translation can be the same as the concept above
Force the application to go in standby (suspend to ram, sometimes called sleep)
Force the application to reboot and to go in standby (called controlled standby)
Wait for all in-progress processes to complete before shutting down the application
$$RC
Button to copy error logs to usb logs after a system error
Concept.String: EXPORT ERROR LOG TO USB KEY
EXPORT ERROR LOG TO USB KEY

Concept.Comments: Button to reboot the application after a system error
This message appears on all system errors
Title of waiting dialog while exporting
This message appears when there's no USB key inserted and the user tries to copy error logs there
This message appears when the log file for users is already presents in USB
This message appears when the log file are exported with success
This message appears when the user tries to copy error logs to a not writable USB key
This message appears when the user tries to copy error logs to a full USB key
Concept.String: NOT ENOUGH FREE SPACE ON USB KEY!

Concept.Comments: This message appears when the user tries to copy logs to a full USB key
Concept.String: PROBLEM WHILE EXPORTING ON USB: LOGS NOT EXPORTED

Concept.Comments: Monitor lighting settings preset for a dark room [massimiliano.omero@esaote.com]
Monitor lighting settings preset for a medium-dark room [massimiliano.omero@esaote.com]
Monitor lighting settings preset for a bright room [massimiliano.omero@esaote.com]
User defined monitor lighting settings (brigthness, contrast, color temperature) [massimiliano.omero@esaote.com]
Reset to factory default monitor lighting settings (brigthness, contrast, color temperature) [massimiliano.omero@esaote.com]
A button to rescan the connected HW and so to refresh (detect) freshly attached monitors

A button to switch the external monitor from a configuration where the Echo image is cloned by the software in a windows that can adapt to any resolution to a real hard cloned copy of the main monitor

A button to switch the external monitor from a real hard cloned copy of the main monitor to a configuration where the Echo image is cloned by the software in a windows that can adapt to any resolution
Increase or decrease monitor contrast when user defined settings are selected [massimiliano.omero@esaote.com]
Increase or decrease monitor brightness when user defined settings are selected [massimiliano.omero@esaote.com]
Increase or decrease monitor red contribution to white point when user defined settings are selected [massimiliano.omero@esaote.com]
Increase or decrease monitor green contribution to white point when user defined settings are selected [massimiliano.omero@esaote.com]
Increase or decrease monitor blue contribution to white point when user defined settings are selected [massimiliano.omero@esaote.com]
Increase or decrease monitor gamma (R/G/B) contribution to white point when user defined settings are selected [massimiliano.omero@esaote.com]
This message appears on the splash window when the application starts
This message appears on desktop version if graphics card is not supported
Concept.String: The Application could not Start: graphics card not supported!

Concept.Comments: This message appears on desktop version if Operating System is not supported
Concept.String: The Application could not Start: Operating System not supported!

Concept.Comments: This message appears on desktop version if resolution is not supported
Message to inform any user that the main monitor is not in the list of the supported models. If final user a call to the service is suggested
Concept.String: MONITOR NOT SUPPORTED, CALL THE SERVICE

Concept.Comments: Message to inform any user that was not possible to retrieve the main monitor model so the auto-detection process failed. If final user a call to the service is suggested
Concept.String: MONITOR NOT DETECTED, CALL THE SERVICE

Concept.Comments: This message appears on the splash window when the touch screen is initializing
This message appears on the splash window when off line processes(Out Of Process hosts) are initializing
This message appears on the splash window when the archive is initializing
This message appears on the splash window when the archive is corrupted and the recovering procedure is running
Concept.String: Archive has been corrupted. The recovering procedure is running

Concept.Comments: This message appears on the 64XX Touch Screen when AC line of the device has been unplugged
Concept.String: The AC line has been unplugged. Please plug it for resuming the job

Concept.Comments: This message appears on the splash window when the component is initializing
This message appears on the splash window when the background service is initializing
This message appears on the splash window when the system is suspending
This message appears on the splash window when the system is resuming
This message appears during shutdown if there are some in progress operation
This message appears on the splash to advise the user that the application startup may take a lot of time
Concept.String: Full boot is running: please wait

Concept.Comments: This message appears on the splash to advise the user that is not possible to shutdown the user during the boot phase
Concept.String: It's impossible to turn off the unit during startup

Concept.Comments: This message appears during the shutdown to advise the user that the application startup may take a lot of time
Concept.String: Full shutdown is running: next boot may take a lot of time

Verification of key's validity end with success
Verification of key's validity end with failure

it appears on the b8 button on the touch screen device. If pressed, it opens the tools mode
The button used to save changes

The button used to reset all demo licenses

Title of tab containing licenses for options

The string is a pop-up message for locked state
The string describes how to unlock the system
Concept.String: In order to unlock press the Freeze Key while holding pressed the Esaote Key.

Concept.Comments: The plugged secondary monitor is incompatible with the primary monitor and cannot be activated
Concept.String: The system resolution is not supported by the plugged monitor.

Concept.Comments: The plugged secondary monitor is incompatible with the full screen viewer. Disconnect the secondary monitor if you want to use this feature
Concept.String: The plugged secondary monitor is incompatible with the full screen viewer. Disconnect the secondary monitor if you want to use this feature.

Concept.Comments: The plugged secondary monitor is compatible with the primary monitor resolution and will be activated
The plugged secondary monitor should be activated but the version does not support runtime activation
Concept.String: Runtime secondary monitor activation is not supported.

Concept.Comments: The plugged secondary monitor is incompatible with the primary monitor resolution so the "Smart" clone will be activated instead of the Physical clone
Concept.String: Physical Clone not possible, clone type defaulted to "Smart" clone. Secondary monitor activation successfully completed.

Title for message that appears when equipment has not been checked by service for a certain time [Story 23490]
First line for message that appears when equipment has not been checked by service for a certain time [Story 23490]
Concept.String: The unit has reached the Manufacturers recommended interval for Preventative Maintenance.

Concept.Comments: First line for message that appears when equipment has not been checked by service for a certain time [Story 23490]
Concept.String: A Preventative Maintenance Inspection is recommended in order to remain compliant with the Manufacturers specifications for this medical device.

Concept.Comments: First line for message that appears when equipment has not been checked by service for a certain time [Story 23490]
Concept.String: PLEASE CONTACT ESAOTE SERVICE OR VISIT THE ESAOTE WEBSITE (WWW.ESAOTE.COM) TO FIND THE LOCAL REPRESENTATIVE.

Concept.Comments: License CV CPU not upgraded to CV GPU [Defect 31132]
Concept.String: Xview not upgraded, please insert license code.

Antivirus scan waiting message popup
Antivirus found threats on system drive message popup.
Concept.String: Antivirus found threats on system drive.

This message appears on the device for advising the user that the virus scan will be performed
Concept.String: The virus scan procedure will be automatically performed after

Concept.Comments: This message appears on the device for advising the user that the virus scan will be performed
This message appears when user identity switches (inserting, removing or changing an USB token) during a resume procedure
Concept.String: Current user different from previous one: forcing shutdown

Concept.Comments: The configuration (factory) is invalid because the specific configuration file is corrupted
Concept.String: Invalid factory configuration data, the specific configuration file is corrupted!

Concept.Comments: The configuration (factory) is invalid because the specific configuration file is not found
Concept.String: Invalid factory configuration data, the system can't find the specific configuration file!

Concept.Comments: The configuration is invalid because the configuration file is corrupted
Concept.String: Invalid configuration data, the configuration file is corrupted!

Concept.Comments: The configuration is invalid because the configuration file is not found
Concept.String: Invalid configuration data, the system can't find the configuration file!

Concept.Comments: The configuration is invalid the system will try to apply factory data.
Concept.String: Invalid specific configuration data, factory will be applied!

Concept.Comments: The configuration is invalid the system will try to apply factory data.
Concept.String: Specific configuration data not found, factory will be applied!

Concept.Comments: The name of an invalid configuration
